name: Women's Permaband Tour Cap
description:
Pioneers of the "Thukk Rokk" musical subculture, the members of Permaband have been touring far and wide across New Eden for decades. With its roots in the nomadic Thukker Tribe serving it well on tour, the band has become something of an institution on the capsuleer music scene, playing to the spaceship pilot elite at their exclusive gatherings around the world of New Eden.

The Permaband Tour Cap is a stylish souvenir of the latest tour of this much-loved band for fans immersing themselves deeply in "Thukk Life".
